title: Best of The Herd for Jul 08, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 08, 2020
description:
An ESPN poll shows that a lot of people in the NFL know nothing about Quarterbacks

There is no "right way" to leave a team in the NBA

Russell Wilson should look at Mahomes and get mad

Patrick Mahomes knows what matters to successful people

Who is worth a 12 year contract in sports?


Guest: Dana White, UFC President live from Fight Island

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
